name: Don't Eat Poison!
description:
Unlock "Royal Pig" automatically with purchase!

Don't Eat Poison! has one simple rule. Don't eat poison.

Do your best to top the local leaderboards, and if you're lucky you can beat the world record on the online leaderboards.

Can you unlock all 16 pigs?

No Ads! No Online Connection Required! No Subscriptions! Just a one time purchase!
